ingredients.ingredient: 1 (1.69 ounce) package candy-coated milk chocolate pieces

cookingTips: Mix ingredients just before eating to keep chocolate pieces from melting
Store in airtight containers or bags for extended freshness
Customize the ratio of nuts to dried fruit based on your preferences
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This no-cook trail mix is perfect for hiking and snacking. Would you like to adjust the nut-to-candy ratio?
